entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Ottawa (Richmond - Metcalfe)
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 05:30 AM EST Friday 03 March 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Mainly Sunny, -7.8°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Ottawa Macdonald-Cartier Int'l Airport 10:00 AM EST Friday 03 March 2023
Condition: Mainly Sunny
Temperature: -7.8°C
Pressure / Tendency: 102.2 kPa rising
Visibility: 24.1 km
Humidity: 58 %
Wind Chill: -12
Dewpoint: -14.7°C
Wind: NE 8 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Friday: Sunny. High zero.

entry.title: Friday night: Snow at times heavy. Low minus 5.
entry.summary: Becoming cloudy this evening. Snow at times heavy beginning near midnight. Amount 5 cm. Wind becoming northeast 20 km/h after midnight. Low minus 5. Wind chill near minus 12. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EST Friday 03 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Snow at times heavy. High zero.
